info.title: API
info.description:
The Terminal49 API lets you pull in shipment details from your BOLs, track ETA changes and other events.

## Schema
Terminal49 implements the [JSON API](https://jsonapi.org/format/) spec. There are [implementations](https://jsonapi.org/implementations/) for consuming it built in most languages which should help you get up to speed consuming quickly.

## Access
Contact us today for your API key.

## Shipment tracking flow.

1. Post a tracking_request with your bill of lading
2. Poll the tracking_request, or setup a webhook to be notified when it has been processed
3. A shipment object will be created

## Status Updates
Shipments are container statuses are checked at various cadences, up to as frequently as every 15 minutes at the terminal. You can be notified of updates by setting up a webhook to receive notifications.

error.title: Invalid arrival_date_from
error.detail: filter['arrival_from'] must be in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' and a valid date

error.title: Invalid arrival_date_to
error.detail: filter['arrival_from'] must be in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' and a valid date

error.title: Invalid port_of_lading
error.detail: port_of_discharge must be an array of 5 character UN/LOCODEs

error.title: Invalid port_of_discharge
error.detail: port_of_discharge must be an array of 5 character UN/LOCODEs

sort.description: Records are sorted by ATA, ETA

q.description: Search shipments by master bill of lading, reference number, or container number.

requestBody.description:
Shipments can be searched and filtered by a variety of properties. 

Each of the filters is exclusive - i.e. you will be returned the intersection of shipments that match all of the filter parameters you provide. 

When a filter param allows passing an array of properties, it will filter against shipments matching any of the values.

get.description: Fetch a single shipment by ID
GET the status of an existing shipment tracking request to see if it has been added yet or not.

errors.title: Unsupported shipping line
errors.detail: We do not currentlly integrate with Bermuda Container Line

errors.title: Unknown customer
errors.detail: We could not find a customer with the id '59b3c977-7009-405e-9f8c-182409b30d40'

post.description: POST a shipment tracking request. When we have connected with the shipping line we will setup the shipment for you.

container.title: Container model
container.description: Represents the equipment during a specific journey.

pickup_lfd.description: The last free day for pickup before deummurage accrues.

availability_known.description: Whether Terminal 49 is receiving availability status from the terminal.

available_for_pickup.description: If availability_known is true, then whether container is available to be picked up at terminal.

pod_discharged_at.description: Discharge time at the port of discharge

pod_picked_up_at.description: Full Out time at port of discharge. Null for inland moves.

destination_unloaded_at.description: Arrival or unloading time at final destination for inland moves.

destination_picked_up_at.description: Pickup time at final destination for inland moves.

most_recent_location.description: The current, or most recent land location.

current_vessel.description: The vessel the container is currently laden on.

firms_code.description: CBP FIRMS Code or CBS Sublocation Code

original_event.description: The event name as originally passed by the source

estimated_at.description: Estimated time for ETA and ETD changes

firms_code.description: CBP FIRMS Code or CBS Sublocation Code
